title: Low Priority  Q Issue
body: I was placed in a 20 minute wait time due to my client crashing during champ select. How do i dispute this?

replies.body:
Truth. I had to step away for a few minutes to talk to my boss. Because LoL isn't going to pay my bills.

I came back and continued my tanking and won the match for the team. 

Now I'm being screwed for 5games because I needed  a couple minutes. You call that justice?

You don't. 

Same thing happened to this account and I just quit league alltogether because of it.
Came back a few days ago after about a year and made a new account instead of having to wait 20 minutes to play a 20 minute game (and I have to do that like 6 times before I get normal priority).

I had a similar situation. Game crash in a vs. bot game testing out new build and league crashed during the load out for about 6 minutes. After the game I was placed in lower priority. I'm done with league. {{champion:14}}
Why the hell would someone get leaverbuster for a BOT Game? Its literally against computers.

Ive uninstalled and reinstalled the game numerous times, i dont have any problems with game requirements nor do i have any viruses, hell 90% of the time i am able to return to the match anyways,the game crashes during champ select, in the post game screen, and it does that annoying bug where everything gets blanked out during champ select but i still get penalized. I just dont understand how this is still a recurring problem considering all the updates and bug fixes riot does.

Lower priority queue from [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) would occur after multiple leaves, and not a single game.  It's not something that can be disputed because leaving still causes other players a negative experience.  My suggestion would be to resolve whatever is causing you to crash and restore your standing with leaverbuster.  If you are still having an issue, let me know what's going on in detail and I'd be happy to help.  Let me know!
